name: Mob Enforcer
storyline: In the 1920s and 1930s, Chicago suffered under the yoke of a criminal organization led by the famous criminal Al Capone. Racketeering, pimping, bootlegging, police killings and ruthless reprisals against rivals - the bandits did not disdain anything, just to assert their influence and earn even more money. Do you think that in Mob Enforcer you have to put an end to lawlessness and clean the streets of Chicago from criminal elements? No matter how! In the role of Jimmy "Machine Gun" DeMora (Jimmy "Machine Gun" DeMora), the player will have to strengthen the position of Al Capone in the city and destroy all of his main competitors.
summary: Mob Enforcer is a video game published in 2004 on Windows by ValuSoft, Inc.. It's an action game, set in a shooter, interwar and crime themes.
